parameter.name: downloadBinaries
parameter.label: Download Stream Binaries
parameter.description: Download the stream binaries for go2rtc and ffmpeg if not already present on the system PATH

parameter.name: useStun
parameter.label: Use STUN for external IP discovery
parameter.description: Use STUN for external IP discovery. This will allow camera streams to work behind NATs when outside your local network (e.g. when using the openHAB cloud service). STUN will incur an approximately 5 second delay starting the stream as it discovers your external IP.

parameter.name: sequence
parameter.label: Sequence
parameter.description: The order in which a snapshot is taken relative to the event or item state change. By default, a snapshot is taken before the trigger event fires or item state updates so its immediately available for use in rules. This however can cause a slight delay in the rule execution if the snapshot itself is delayed. To take a snapshot after the event trigger fires or item state updates, you can set this to "after". If you do not want to take a snapshot on a trigger event or item state update, you can set this to "none". Image items can also be updated in rules using either the setImage action (`actions.HTTP.setImage`) or by sending a Refresh command to the item.

options.option: Take a snapshot before firing the trigger event or updating the item state.
Take a snapshot after firing the trigger event or updating the item state.
Do not take a snapshot automatically.

parameter.name: motionLatchDelay
parameter.label: Motion Latch Delay
parameter.description: The delay in milliseconds to wait before the contact is considered latched/closed after the last motion event.
